dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, Host_B, have you seen the news about higher education in Kazakhstan? Big things happening!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, Host B, have you seen the news about higher education in Kazakhstan? Big things happening!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I caught a glimpse! Is it about... Coventry University?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I caught a glimpse! Is it about Coventry University?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Coventry University is, like, launching a new campus there. Which is pretty massive, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Coventry University is, like, launching a new campus there. Which is pretty massive, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Kazakhstan, the Coventry University campus project is being implemented with the support of Primus Education, which is investing in the future of education, aligning with Kazakhstans goal of modernizing its education system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no kidding! So, what are they actually offering? Because, uh, a British university opening up shop, that's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no kidding! So, what are they actually offering? Because, uh, a British university opening up shop, that's a big deal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they're going to have MBA Global Business programs, and a bunch of Bachelor's degrees. Think business, HR management, pedagogy, computer science, even digital marketing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they're going to have M B A Global Business programs, and a bunch of Bachelor's degrees. Think business, H R management, pedagogy, computer science, even digital marketing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university will offer MBA Global Business and Bachelors degree programs... Bachelors degree programs at Coventry University for Kazakhstan will cover disciplines in which the university holds leading positions in world rankings. These include business and human resource management, pedagogy, computer science, information technology management, advertising, digital marketing, and others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's a wide range! [interrupts] And they get a British diploma upon completion, right? That's the key.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's a wide range! And they get a British diploma upon completion, right? That's the key.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The university will offer MBA Global Business and Bachelors degree programs, and upon completion of these programs, a British diploma will be issued.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely, a British diploma. And get this, there's also a really cool program for teachers, like, school heads and college principals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely, a British diploma. And get this, there's also a really cool program for teachers, like, school heads and college principals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, the university offers a program for teachers, including heads of schools and colleges, to obtain an international postgraduate certificate in education and the status of an internationally qualified teacher.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, interesting! An international postgraduate certificate in education?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, interesting! An international postgraduate certificate in education?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they'll get status as an internationally qualified teacher. It was developed by the National Institute of Teaching and Education in the UK, NITE.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they'll get status as an internationally qualified teacher. It was developed by the National Institute of Teaching and Education in the U K, N I T E.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The program was developed by the National Institute of Teaching and Education in the United Kingdom (NITE) and is accredited by the Department of Education in England.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's super timely, you know, with the demand for qualified teachers. Kathy Leach, the British Ambassador, even mentioned that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's super timely, you know, with the demand for qualified teachers. Kathy Leach, the British Ambassador, even mentioned that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In an era when the demand for qualified teachers is constantly growing, such programs are timely and necessary for the development of education in Kazakhstan... said Kathy Leach, the British Ambassador to Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: She did! And Craig Blyth from Coventry also emphasized their global reach, different formatsâ€”face-to-face, online, hybrid.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She did! And Craig Blyth from Coventry also emphasized their global reach, different formats-face-to-face, online, hybrid.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The University provides high-quality education all over the world, both face-to-face, online, and in a hybrid format, as well as offering practical opportunities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, what about the cost? Because studying abroad, that's usually the big barrier, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, what about the cost? Because studying abroad, that's usually the big barrier, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's the best part! It's going to be *much* more affordable compared to studying in the UK, considering flights and accommodation. Plus, they're offering grants for outstanding students.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the best part! It's going to be much more affordable compared to studying in the U K, considering flights and accommodation. Plus, they're offering grants for outstanding students.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It should be noted that studying in Kazakhstan will be much more affordable compared to the cost of education abroad, considering the cost of flight and accommodation. University grants will be awarded on a competitive basis to applicants with outstanding academic results, as well as achievements in sports, art, and other fields, confirmed by prize-winning places in Olympiads and competitions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's a game-changer! Affordable *and* grants? That really opens doors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's a game-changer! Affordable and grants? That really opens doors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And the quality, that's always a question when a university expands globally, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And the quality, that's always a question when a university expands globally, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Are they just, like, franchising their name? Or is it the real deal?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Are they just, like, franchising their name? Or is it the real deal?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Craig Blyth was really clear on this. He said the quality of education at the Kazakhstan campus will "correspond to the UK campus." Same benefits, same access to technology, even simulators.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Craig Blyth was really clear on this. He said the quality of education at the Kazakhstan campus will correspond to the U K campus. Same benefits, same access to technology, even simulators.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The quality of education at the universitys campus in Kazakhstan will correspond to the UK campus... Our students in Kazakhstan will have the same benefits and opportunities as other campuses abroad. We provide access to all technologies, and many of our students get their first experience in simulators. Kazakhstani students will also have this opportunity, Craig Blyth stressed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's excellent to hear. And Coventry, um, they've got a pretty solid reputation globally, don't they? Like, founded in 1843, very innovative.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's excellent to hear. And Coventry, um, they've got a pretty solid reputation globally, don't they? Like, founded in eighteen forty three, very innovative.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coventry University, founded in 1843, is ranked among the worlds leading institutions of higher education by many indicators... It is recognized as one of the most innovative modern universities, according to Times Higher Education.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, big time. Ranked among leading institutions, known for quality teaching, student experience. This is, like, a huge win for education in Kazakhstan, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, big time. Ranked among leading institutions, known for quality teaching, student experience. This is, like, a huge win for education in Kazakhstan, don't you think?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coventry University, founded in 1843, is ranked among the worlds leading institutions of higher education by many indicators, including the quality of teaching, the best student experience, the level of interaction with students, and satisfaction in the field of business and management.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's a fantastic opportunity for students to get a world-class education without necessarily having to leave the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's a fantastic opportunity for students to get a world-class education without necessarily having to leave the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Couldn't agree more.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Couldn't agree more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, pretty exciting times ahead for their students!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, pretty exciting times ahead for their students!
